participant_1.background:
I have a soft spot for my parents and sweets.
i love watching sitcoms on television.
i like to play soccer , draw and read asterix.
My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

participant_2.background:
I have turned my passion for juice into a business.
connor mcgregor is my favorite fighter.
My dogs are my best friends and I want to learn how to be a better dog owner.
I came to know my family by growing up with them.
i love hiking and staying fit.

content.text: I am well! Thanks for asking. How are you?
I am doing well, thank you! What are your hobbies?
I love to hike and stay fit. I also love making juice and have turned my passion for juice into a business.
That sounds amazing! I am more of an indoor person, but I like to watch sitcoms on television and read Asterix.
Asterix is a classic! I have always wanted to go hiking in Europe to see some of the places where it was set.
That would be really cool! I have heard that the hiking trails are beautiful there.
I have heard the same. It would be a great experience.
I agree! What do you like to do with your dogs?
I love to take them for walks and play fetch with them. They are my best friends and I love them to death.
That sounds so sweet! I love dogs, but I do not have any of my own.
You should get one! They are the best companions and they always make me happy.
Maybe one day! I would love to have a dog, but I am not sure if I have the time to properly take care of one right now.
I understand. They are a lot of responsibility, but they are worth it.
I am sure they are! Thanks for chatting with me!
You are welcome! It was nice talking to you!
